title: The Art of Ping Pong
brief_description: The Art of Ping Pong, by Bristol based artist Jono Sandilands, utilises projection mapping of a ping pong table to record player interactions and create multimedia art installations.

constellations_other.name: The first home console and the art of ping pong
constellations_other.description: An exploration of tennis and ping pong throughout the moving image.

description: The Art of Ping Pong, by Bristol based artist Jono Sandilands, utilises projection mapping of a ping pong table to record player interactions and create multimedia art installations.
